name: Expert Tax Stockholm 2026 - Very High Income (30% exemption, triggers state tax)
description: Very high-earning foreign specialist earning SEK 1,500,000 in Stockholm with 2026 Expert Tax (30% exemption)

sources.description: Based on 2026 Expert Tax rules: 30% exemption. Stockholm municipal tax 30.55%, state tax 20% above taxable 643,000, grundavdrag SEK 17,400
